alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:43PM CST until March 08 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by mid tomorrow evening to a crest of 13.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 11.5 Fri 7 pm CST 12.9 13.3 13.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
